import.title: Import Convenes
import.invalidLink: Invalid link, please check it again

2.title: Run the following command.
2.content: Open {windowsPowerShell} and run the following command (Paste your game path if asked).

3.title: Paste the Convene Record URL into the box below.

1.title: What if I import many different accounts?
1.content: Don't worry, when you import multiple accounts we will automatically split them and you will see an account switch button appear.

2.title: Why not updating the record?
2.content: There is a 30-minute delay for record updates. If no data is shown on this page, please try again later. Convene displayed time zone:America(UTC-5); Europe(UTC+1); Asia,HMT, SEA(UTC+8).

3.title: Is my account safe?
3.content: Yes, through this import method it will not be possible to interfere with your account. And finally, this website is open source on github you can see and evaluate it yourself, if you still don't trust you can skip this feature and use other features.

rank.title: Your Global Rank
rank.more: You have more pull than {percentage}% users
rank.less: You have less pull than {percentage}% users

convene.title: Convene Showcase
convene.emptyCard: Please import convene history to fill the card.

weapons.introduction: In Wuthering Waves, {name} is a {rarity}★ weapon.

0.title: Where is my data being stored when I import?
0.content:
Your URL is only saved to your web browser. Clearing your browser data on this website will delete your stored data. If you want to check your history, you'll need to import it again.

You also have to option to safely backup your URL using your Google Account inside the Settings page.

1.title: How do I know this website won't steal my data?
1.content: Rest assured, we are players just like you and want to help Wuthering Waves grow by building useful tools for the all the Rovers in the world.

2.title: My history is not automatically updating, what's wrong?
2.content: Just like in-game, your history does not instantly update. Try checking again later to see if your history is updated, otherwise it could be a bug.

3.title: How do I raise a bug report or suggest a feature?
3.content: You can create an issue in our GitHub repository using the proper template so that we can address your concern as soon as possible. Your contribution will help us create a better experience for our users, so we would greatly appreciate it!

4.title: How can I support this website?
4.content: Thank you for using this website. As you continue to use it, you also inspire us to keep improving it. Don't forget to leave a star on Github! If you want to support us financially, we have a Donation page to accept any donations to keep the website running!

codes.title: Gift Codes
codes.howToRedeem: How to Redeem Wuthering Waves Codes
codes.howToRedeemGuide: In-game menu, click the settings icon in the bottom right corner. Select the "Other Settings" tab with the spanner symbol. Hit the "Redeem" button next to the "Redemption Code" under Account.
codes.redeemRequirementGuide: You must be at least Union Level 2 and completing the Chapter 1, Act 1 "Utterance of Marvels: I" main quest.

search.title: Global Search
search.alert: You can search everything there is on WutheringWaves.app.
search.alertTips: Press the key combination Ctrl + Space to open the fastest search box!

desktopApp.title: Desktop App
desktopApp.introduce: With the desktop app, you can import your convene history automatically, view live maps in-game, view item information, and more.
